sentences.sentence: Men are seen there with the dreadful chimney-pot hat, but there are very few hatless men;
sentences.translation: 这的男人都带着很糟糕的烟囱管帽子，而且很少有不戴帽子的人；

sentences.sentence: Fill in "Application Form of Foreigner's Visa and Residence Permit", one recent frontal hatless half –length passport-size photo.
sentences.translation: 填写《外国人签证、居留许可申请表》，常住境外人员登记表两张，交三张近期二寸半身正面免冠彩色照片；
